mapper.select: select bno, subject, teacher, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, show, (select count(*) from kdemyreview_reply where bno=b.bno) cnt from kdemyreview b where show='Y' order by bno desc

select count(*) from kdemyreview b
where show='Y' and (title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} )
mapper.insert: insert into kdemyreview (bno,subject,teacher,title,content,writer,fullName) values ( seq_kdemyreview.nextval, #{subject}, #{teacher}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{fullName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
insert into kdemyreview (fullName, filenum) values ( #{fullName}, seq_kdemyreview.currval )
mapper.update: update kdemyreview set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: update kdemyreview set show='N' where bno=#{bno}
